abstract: Abel Ferrara, the director of "King of New York" and "Bad Lieutenant," said he had cast Gérard Depardieu and Isabelle Adjani to play Dominique Strauss-Kahn and Anne Sinclair in a film about their lives during a notorious sex scandal. But Mr. Ferrara's producer was less certain that this would be his next project.
lead_paragraph: The behind-the-scenes drama between Dominique Strauss-Kahn and his wife, Anne Sinclair, amid a notorious sex scandal - or, at least, a screenwriter's imagining of this drama - will be the subject of a new movie directed by Abel Ferrara, that filmmaker said, though his producer was less certain that this would be his next project.

headline.main: Abel Ferrara Says He's Making a Film About Dominique Strauss-Kahn
